bug.summary: The behavior of EarlyStopping is not the same between 0.7.5 with 0.7.3
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
The behavior of EarlyStopping is not the same between 0.7.5 with 0.7.3, If i set patience=1, 0.7.3 will print two epoch when the second is worse than the first, but 0.7.5 will just print the first which is not consistent with the description of patience parameter <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Code sample</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>early_stop_callback = EarlyStopping(monitor='valid_roc_auc', patience=0, mode='max', verbose=True) # Instance Model, Trainer and train model model = PlantModel(hparams) trainer = pl.Trainer(gpus=[hparams.gpus], max_epochs=hparams.max_epochs, early_stop_callback=early_stop_callback, progress_bar_refresh_rate=0, num_sanity_val_steps=0, profiler=True, gradient_clip_val=hparams.gradient_clip_val) trainer.fit(model) print(trainer.early_stop_callback.wait) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
